discourse_list.title: EIP-6733 revert contract creation on address collision

content.content: Hey everyone, this is my PR for this EIP, would love some feedback, thank you   github.com/ethereum/EIPs         EIP contract collision   ethereum:master ← RenanSouza2:EIP-contract-collision              opened 08:31PM - 20 Mar 23 UTC                 RenanSouza2               +73 -0       When opening a pull request to submit a new EIP, please use the suggested templa…te: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/eip-template.md  We have a GitHub bot that automatically merges some PRs. It will merge yours immediately if certain criteria are met:   - The PR edits only existing draft PRs.  - The build passes.  - Your GitHub username or email address is listed in the 'author' header of all affected PRs, inside <triangular brackets>.  - If matching on email address, the email address is the one publicly listed on your GitHub profile.
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is submitting a new EIP and is asking for feedback on their proposal. They also provide a link to the EIP template and mention the criteria that need to be met for the PR to be merged. Some 3rd parties may give constructive criticism, ask questions, or audit and review the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback
Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: Made the recommended grammar fixes, Updated the EIP number where needed including the title of this post
